Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
com.group18.model.Schedule
public class Schedule extends Object
This class represents the scheduling details for a movie session. It includes information such as the movie ID, hall ID, session date, session time, and the number of available seats for the session.

  • Field Details

    • scheduleId

      private int scheduleId
      Represents the unique identifier for the schedule. This ID distinguishes each schedule entry in the system.

    • movieId

      private int movieId
      Represents the unique identifier for a movie associated with a specific schedule. This ID is used to reference a movie in the system.

    • hallId

      private int hallId
      Identifier for the hall where the movie session is scheduled. This ID references the corresponding entry in the halls table.

    • sessionDate

      private LocalDate sessionDate
      Represents the date of a movie session. This field is used to specify on which date a session is scheduled.

    • sessionTime

      private LocalTime sessionTime
      Represents the time at which a movie session is scheduled to start. This field is used in conjunction with the session date to define when a specific movie session will take place.

    • availableSeats

      private int availableSeats
      Represents the number of available seats for a movie session. This value indicates the count of seats that have not been booked yet. HOWEVER, THIS IS NOT BEING USED, Instead we retrieve them from the current orders.

  • Constructor Details

    • Schedule

      public Schedule()
      Constructs a new, empty Schedule object. This constructor initializes an instance of the Schedule class without setting any properties.

    • Schedule

      public Schedule(int movieId, int hallId, LocalDate sessionDate, LocalTime sessionTime)
      Constructs a Schedule instance with the specified movie ID, hall ID, session date, and session time.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the unique identifier of the movie being scheduled
      hallId - the unique identifier of the hall where the session will take place
      sessionDate - the date on which the movie session will occur
      sessionTime - the time at which the movie session will start

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableSeats

      public int getAvailableSeats()
      Retrieves the number of available seats for the movie session. HOWEVER, THIS IS NOT BEING USED, Instead we retrieve them from the current orders.
      Returns:
      the number of available seats

    • setAvailableSeats

      public void setAvailableSeats(int availableSeats)
      Sets the number of available seats for the movie session. HOWEVER, THIS IS NOT BEING USED, Instead we retrieve them from the current orders.
      Parameters:
      availableSeats - the number of seats available for this session

    • getScheduleId

      public int getScheduleId()
      Retrieves the unique identifier of the schedule.
      Returns:
      The schedule ID.

    • setScheduleId

      public void setScheduleId(int scheduleId)
      Sets the ID for the schedule.
      Parameters:
      scheduleId - The unique identifier for the schedule.

    • getMovieId

      public int getMovieId()
      Retrieves the ID of the movie associated with this schedule.
      Returns:
      The movie ID.

    • setMovieId

      public void setMovieId(int movieId)
      Sets the ID of the movie associated with the schedule.
      Parameters:
      movieId - The ID of the movie to be set.

    • getHallId

      public int getHallId()
      Retrieves the ID of the hall associated with this schedule.
      Returns:
      The hall ID as an integer.

    • setHallId

      public void setHallId(int hallId)
      Sets the ID of the hall for the schedule.
      Parameters:
      hallId - The ID of the hall to be associated with the schedule.

    • getSessionDate

      public LocalDate getSessionDate()
      Retrieves the session date associated with the schedule.
      Returns:
      The session date as a LocalDate object.

    • setSessionDate

      public void setSessionDate(LocalDate sessionDate)
      Sets the session date for the schedule.
      Parameters:
      sessionDate - The date of the session to be scheduled.

    • getSessionTime

      public LocalTime getSessionTime()
      Retrieves the session time for the schedule.
      Returns:
      The session time as a LocalTime object.

    • setSessionTime

      public void setSessionTime(LocalTime sessionTime)
      Sets the session time for the schedule.
      Parameters:
      sessionTime - The time of the session.
